thread.title: WATCH LIVE: Steve Spurrier retiring at noon news conference
thread.title_full: WATCH LIVE: Steve Spurrier retiring at noon news conference

author: Jeremy Turnage
title: WATCH LIVE: Steve Spurrier retiring at noon news conference
text:
WATCH LIVE: Steve Spurrier retiring at noon news conference - KPLC 7 News, Lake Charles, Louisiana Member Center: WATCH LIVE: Steve Spurrier retiring at noon news conference Posted: Tuesday, October 13 2015 12:34 PM EDT 2015-10-13 16:34:48 GMT Shawn Elliot (Source: 247Sports) As the South Carolina sports world is recovering from the bombshell announcement that Gamecocks head football coach Steve Spurrier would be retiring from the game effective immediately, the team is already getting ready to tap its offensive line coach to take over in the interim. More >> As the South Carolina sports world is recovering from the bombshell announcement that Gamecocks head football coach Steve Spurrier would be retiring from the game effective immediately, the team is already getting ready to tap its offensive line coach to take over in the interim. More >> COLUMBIA, SC (WIS) - 
South Carolina head football coach Steve Spurrier is expected to hang up the visor on Tuesday during a noon news conference. 
Copyright 2015 WIS. All rights reserved. More Local News Local More>> news Tuesday, October 13 2015 12:33 PM EDT 2015-10-13 16:33:18 GMT Lake Charles Senior Center (Source: KPLC) Erik Tyger in the KPLC newsroom with a look at what we're working on for 7News at Noon. The Lake Charles Senior Center is being torn down today so it can be replaced with a bigger, more modern facility. Erika Ferrando is at the facility on 5th street for a live report.
